ca.corefacility.gview.utils.thread

Class PaintThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ca.corefacility.gview.utils.thread.PaintThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Object>

    public class PaintThread
extends java.lang.Thread
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Object>
    This class is responsible for executing a portion of the multithreaded paint on the Graphics2D object. It is implemented as both a Thread and a Callable. The call() method will execute the run() method. Graphics2D and Swing are not designed to be thread-safe. This is NOT garunteed to work, but should function correctly so long as the multithreaded interaction to the Graphics2D object is VERY, VERY minimal. We cannot change the clip, the transform, the color or the composite.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier
